substeps.plaintext: The painting is added to the Mysterious Clipboard in Aranyaka.
substeps.markdown: The painting is added to the ◀Mysterious Clipboard▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Aranyaka_(Gadget)#Mysterious_Clipboard▷ in ◀Aranyaka▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Aranyaka_(Gadget)▷.

steps.plaintext: Proceed to the location shown in the painting
steps.markdown: Proceed to the location shown in the painting

substeps.plaintext: Proceed to the Statue of The Seven in the reality version of Vanarana. Dig at the spot shown in the photo in the Mysterious Clipboard.
substeps.markdown: Proceed to the ◀Statue of The Seven▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Statue_of_The_Seven▷ in the reality version of Vanarana. Dig at the spot shown in the photo in the Mysterious Clipboard.

substeps.plaintext: This completes Picture 1 in the Mysterious Clipboard.
substeps.markdown: This completes Picture 1 in the Mysterious Clipboard.

substeps.plaintext: Here, the mailbox can be accessed in both reality and dream version of Vanarana.
substeps.markdown: Here, the mailbox can be accessed in both reality and dream version of Vanarana.
